channel.title: Save files when reset
channel.description:
Hi everytime i reset my server i want the accs to save because when the server resets some players get rolled back
Can somone give me the code so that when the server resets it saves there files?
And where to put it i mean what file?
Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 01:10:59 pm[/size][hr]no one wants to help??
